Perceptual Concepts in El Cajon, CA, US (United States) www.perceptualconcepts.com Company Overview:
Designer&manufacturer of custom displays&signage for the product marketing, visual merchandising&fast food restaurant industries. Displays include point of purchase, store fixtures, counter, floor, end of aisle, photographic, advertising kiosks, corporate lobbies, information centers, showrooms, museums, trade show exhibits, retail environments, theatrical&interactive. Signs include indoor&outdoor, menu board systems, interchangeable numerals, illuminated light boxes, magnetic, metal&plastic, channel&cast, banners, 3-D logos, directories, large format graphics, vinyl lettering, plaques&markers, sign holders, LED. Services include metal&acrylic fabrication, plastic extruding, vacuum forming, injection molding, wood working, graphic design, silk screening&printing, stock photos, fleet marking, assembly, fulfillment, packaging, warehousing, drop shipping&installation.
Company Statistics: View Contact Details Address: 1866 Friendship Drive, Suite D, El Cajon, CA, 92020, United States Telephone: 619-449-1745 Fax: 619-562-1869 Web: http://www.perceptualconcepts.com Email the company Pages on Perceptual Concepts's website
